module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.AnalysisOptions

-- | Synonyms, stopwords, and stemming options for an analysis scheme.
--   Includes tokenization dictionary for Japanese.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAnalysisOptions</a> smart constructor.
data AnalysisOptions
AnalysisOptions' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe AlgorithmicStemming -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> AnalysisOptions

-- | A JSON array of terms to ignore during indexing and searching. For
--   example, <tt>["a", "an", "the", "of"]</tt>. The stopwords dictionary
--   must explicitly list each word you want to ignore. Wildcards and
--   regular expressions are not supported.
[$sel:stopwords:AnalysisOptions'] :: AnalysisOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | The level of algorithmic stemming to perform: <tt>none</tt>,
--   <tt>minimal</tt>, <tt>light</tt>, or <tt>full</tt>. The available
--   levels vary depending on the language. For more information, see
--   <a>Language Specific Text Processing Settings</a> in the <i>Amazon
--   CloudSearch Developer Guide</i>
[$sel:algorithmicStemming:AnalysisOptions'] :: AnalysisOptions -> Maybe AlgorithmicStemming

-- | A JSON object that defines synonym groups and aliases. A synonym group
--   is an array of arrays, where each sub-array is a group of terms where
--   each term in the group is considered a synonym of every other term in
--   the group. The aliases value is an object that contains a collection
--   of string:value pairs where the string specifies a term and the array
--   of values specifies each of the aliases for that term. An alias is
--   considered a synonym of the specified term, but the term is not
--   considered a synonym of the alias. For more information about
--   specifying synonyms, see <a>Synonyms</a> in the <i>Amazon CloudSearch
--   Developer Guide</i>.
[$sel:synonyms:AnalysisOptions'] :: AnalysisOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | A JSON object that contains a collection of string:value pairs that
--   each map a term to its stem. For example, <tt>{"term1": "stem1",
--   "term2": "stem2", "term3": "stem3"}</tt>. The stemming dictionary is
--   applied in addition to any algorithmic stemming. This enables you to
--   override the results of the algorithmic stemming to correct specific
--   cases of overstemming or understemming. The maximum size of a stemming
--   dictionary is 500 KB.
[$sel:stemmingDictionary:AnalysisOptions'] :: AnalysisOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | A JSON array that contains a collection of terms, tokens, readings and
--   part of speech for Japanese Tokenizaiton. The Japanese tokenization
--   dictionary enables you to override the default tokenization for
--   selected terms. This is only valid for Japanese language fields.
[$sel:japaneseTokenizationDictionary:AnalysisOptions'] :: AnalysisOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AnalysisOptions</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:stopwords:AnalysisOptions'</a>,
--   <a>analysisOptions_stopwords</a> - A JSON array of terms to ignore
--   during indexing and searching. For example, <tt>["a", "an", "the",
--   "of"]</tt>. The stopwords dictionary must explicitly list each word
--   you want to ignore. Wildcards and regular expressions are not
--   supported.
--   
--   <a>$sel:algorithmicStemming:AnalysisOptions'</a>,
--   <a>analysisOptions_algorithmicStemming</a> - The level of algorithmic
--   stemming to perform: <tt>none</tt>, <tt>minimal</tt>, <tt>light</tt>,
--   or <tt>full</tt>. The available levels vary depending on the language.
--   For more information, see <a>Language Specific Text Processing
--   Settings</a> in the <i>Amazon CloudSearch Developer Guide</i>
--   
--   <a>$sel:synonyms:AnalysisOptions'</a>, <a>analysisOptions_synonyms</a>
--   - A JSON object that defines synonym groups and aliases. A synonym
--   group is an array of arrays, where each sub-array is a group of terms
--   where each term in the group is considered a synonym of every other
--   term in the group. The aliases value is an object that contains a
--   collection of string:value pairs where the string specifies a term and
--   the array of values specifies each of the aliases for that term. An
--   alias is considered a synonym of the specified term, but the term is
--   not considered a synonym of the alias. For more information about
--   specifying synonyms, see <a>Synonyms</a> in the <i>Amazon CloudSearch
--   Developer Guide</i>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stemmingDictionary:AnalysisOptions'</a>,
--   <a>analysisOptions_stemmingDictionary</a> - A JSON object that
--   contains a collection of string:value pairs that each map a term to
--   its stem. For example, <tt>{"term1": "stem1", "term2": "stem2",
--   "term3": "stem3"}</tt>. The stemming dictionary is applied in addition
--   to any algorithmic stemming. This enables you to override the results
--   of the algorithmic stemming to correct specific cases of overstemming
--   or understemming. The maximum size of a stemming dictionary is 500 KB.
--   
--   <a>$sel:japaneseTokenizationDictionary:AnalysisOptions'</a>,
--   <a>analysisOptions_japaneseTokenizationDictionary</a> - A JSON array
--   that contains a collection of terms, tokens, readings and part of
--   speech for Japanese Tokenizaiton. The Japanese tokenization dictionary
--   enables you to override the default tokenization for selected terms.
--   This is only valid for Japanese language fields.
newAnalysisOptions :: AnalysisOptions

-- | A JSON array of terms to ignore during indexing and searching. For
--   example, <tt>["a", "an", "the", "of"]</tt>. The stopwords dictionary
--   must explicitly list each word you want to ignore. Wildcards and
--   regular expressions are not supported.
analysisOptions_stopwords :: Lens' AnalysisOptions (Maybe Text)

-- | The level of algorithmic stemming to perform: <tt>none</tt>,
--   <tt>minimal</tt>, <tt>light</tt>, or <tt>full</tt>. The available
--   levels vary depending on the language. For more information, see
--   <a>Language Specific Text Processing Settings</a> in the <i>Amazon
--   CloudSearch Developer Guide</i>
analysisOptions_algorithmicStemming :: Lens' AnalysisOptions (Maybe AlgorithmicStemming)

-- | A JSON object that defines synonym groups and aliases. A synonym group
--   is an array of arrays, where each sub-array is a group of terms where
--   each term in the group is considered a synonym of every other term in
--   the group. The aliases value is an object that contains a collection
--   of string:value pairs where the string specifies a term and the array
--   of values specifies each of the aliases for that term. An alias is
--   considered a synonym of the specified term, but the term is not
--   considered a synonym of the alias. For more information about
--   specifying synonyms, see <a>Synonyms</a> in the <i>Amazon CloudSearch
--   Developer Guide</i>.
analysisOptions_synonyms :: Lens' AnalysisOptions (Maybe Text)

-- | A JSON object that contains a collection of string:value pairs that
--   each map a term to its stem. For example, <tt>{"term1": "stem1",
--   "term2": "stem2", "term3": "stem3"}</tt>. The stemming dictionary is
--   applied in addition to any algorithmic stemming. This enables you to
--   override the results of the algorithmic stemming to correct specific
--   cases of overstemming or understemming. The maximum size of a stemming
--   dictionary is 500 KB.
analysisOptions_stemmingDictionary :: Lens' AnalysisOptions (Maybe Text)

-- | A JSON array that contains a collection of terms, tokens, readings and
--   part of speech for Japanese Tokenizaiton. The Japanese tokenization
--   dictionary enables you to override the default tokenization for
--   selected terms. This is only valid for Japanese language fields.
analysisOptions_japaneseTokenizationDictionary :: Lens' AnalysisOptions (Maybe Text)

module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.AnalysisScheme

-- | Configuration information for an analysis scheme. Each analysis scheme
--   has a unique name and specifies the language of the text to be
--   processed. The following options can be configured for an analysis
--   scheme: <tt>Synonyms</tt>, <tt>Stopwords</tt>,
--   <tt>StemmingDictionary</tt>, <tt>JapaneseTokenizationDictionary</tt>
--   and <tt>AlgorithmicStemming</tt>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAnalysisScheme</a> smart constructor.
data AnalysisScheme
AnalysisScheme' :: Maybe AnalysisOptions -> Text -> AnalysisSchemeLanguage -> AnalysisScheme
[$sel:analysisOptions:AnalysisScheme'] :: AnalysisScheme -> Maybe AnalysisOptions
[$sel:analysisSchemeName:AnalysisScheme'] :: AnalysisScheme -> Text
[$sel:analysisSchemeLanguage:AnalysisScheme'] :: AnalysisScheme -> AnalysisSchemeLanguage

-- | Create a value of <a>AnalysisScheme</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:analysisOptions:AnalysisScheme'</a>,
--   <a>analysisScheme_analysisOptions</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:analysisSchemeName:AnalysisScheme'</a>,
--   <a>analysisScheme_analysisSchemeName</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:analysisSchemeLanguage:AnalysisScheme'</a>,
--   <a>analysisScheme_analysisSchemeLanguage</a> - Undocumented member.
newAnalysisScheme :: Text -> AnalysisSchemeLanguage -> AnalysisScheme

-- | Undocumented member.
analysisScheme_analysisOptions :: Lens' AnalysisScheme (Maybe AnalysisOptions)

-- | Undocumented member.
analysisScheme_analysisSchemeName :: Lens' AnalysisScheme Text

-- | Undocumented member.
analysisScheme_analysisSchemeLanguage :: Lens' AnalysisScheme AnalysisSchemeLanguage
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.AnalysisScheme.AnalysisScheme
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.AnalysisScheme.AnalysisScheme
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.AnalysisScheme.AnalysisScheme
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.AnalysisScheme.AnalysisScheme
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.AnalysisScheme.AnalysisScheme
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.AnalysisScheme.AnalysisScheme
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.AnalysisScheme.AnalysisScheme

module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DateArrayOptions

-- | Options for a field that contains an array of dates. Present if
--   <tt>IndexFieldType</tt> specifies the field is of type
--   <tt>date-array</tt>. All options are enabled by default.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDateArrayOptions</a> smart constructor.
data DateArrayOptions
DateArrayOptions' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> DateArrayOptions

-- | A list of source fields to map to the field.
[$sel:sourceFields:DateArrayOptions'] :: DateArrayOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
[$sel:facetEnabled:DateArrayOptions'] :: DateArrayOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
[$sel:returnEnabled:DateArrayOptions'] :: DateArrayOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
[$sel:searchEnabled:DateArrayOptions'] :: DateArrayOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
[$sel:defaultValue:DateArrayOptions'] :: DateArrayOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>DateArrayOptions</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceFields:DateArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>dateArrayOptions_sourceFields</a> - A list of source fields to map
--   to the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:facetEnabled:DateArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>dateArrayOptions_facetEnabled</a> - Whether facet information can
--   be returned for the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:returnEnabled:DateArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>dateArrayOptions_returnEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the
--   field can be returned in the search results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:searchEnabled:DateArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>dateArrayOptions_searchEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the
--   field are searchable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultValue:DateArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>dateArrayOptions_defaultValue</a> - A value to use for the field if
--   the field isn't specified for a document.
newDateArrayOptions :: DateArrayOptions

-- | A list of source fields to map to the field.
dateArrayOptions_sourceFields :: Lens' DateArrayOptions (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.

module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DateOptions

-- | Options for a date field. Dates and times are specified in UTC
--   (Coordinated Universal Time) according to IETF RFC3339:
--   yyyy-mm-ddT00:00:00Z. Present if <tt>IndexFieldType</tt> specifies the
--   field is of type <tt>date</tt>. All options are enabled by default.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDateOptions</a> smart constructor.
data DateOptions
DateOptions' :: Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> DateOptions

-- | Whether the field can be used to sort the search results.
[$sel:sortEnabled:DateOptions'] :: DateOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
[$sel:facetEnabled:DateOptions'] :: DateOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
[$sel:returnEnabled:DateOptions'] :: DateOptions -> Maybe Bool
[$sel:sourceField:DateOptions'] :: DateOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
[$sel:searchEnabled:DateOptions'] :: DateOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
[$sel:defaultValue:DateOptions'] :: DateOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>DateOptions</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sortEnabled:DateOptions'</a>, <a>dateOptions_sortEnabled</a> -
--   Whether the field can be used to sort the search results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:facetEnabled:DateOptions'</a>, <a>dateOptions_facetEnabled</a>
--   - Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:returnEnabled:DateOptions'</a>,
--   <a>dateOptions_returnEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the field
--   can be returned in the search results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceField:DateOptions'</a>, <a>dateOptions_sourceField</a> -
--   Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:searchEnabled:DateOptions'</a>,
--   <a>dateOptions_searchEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the field
--   are searchable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultValue:DateOptions'</a>, <a>dateOptions_defaultValue</a>
--   - A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
newDateOptions :: DateOptions

-- | Whether the field can be used to sort the search results.
dateOptions_sortEnabled :: Lens' DateOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
dateOptions_facetEnabled :: Lens' DateOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
dateOptions_returnEnabled :: Lens' DateOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Undocumented member.
dateOptions_sourceField :: Lens' DateOptions (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
dateOptions_searchEnabled :: Lens' DateOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
dateOptions_defaultValue :: Lens' DateOptions (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DateOptions.DateOptions
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DateOptions.DateOptions
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DateOptions.DateOptions
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DateOptions.DateOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DateOptions.DateOptions
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DateOptions.DateOptions
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DateOptions.DateOptions

module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleArrayOptions

-- | Options for a field that contains an array of double-precision 64-bit
--   floating point values. Present if <tt>IndexFieldType</tt> specifies
--   the field is of type <tt>double-array</tt>. All options are enabled by
--   default.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDoubleArrayOptions</a> smart constructor.
data DoubleArrayOptions
DoubleArrayOptions' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Double -> DoubleArrayOptions

-- | A list of source fields to map to the field.
[$sel:sourceFields:DoubleArrayOptions'] :: DoubleArrayOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
[$sel:facetEnabled:DoubleArrayOptions'] :: DoubleArrayOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
[$sel:returnEnabled:DoubleArrayOptions'] :: DoubleArrayOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
[$sel:searchEnabled:DoubleArrayOptions'] :: DoubleArrayOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
[$sel:defaultValue:DoubleArrayOptions'] :: DoubleArrayOptions -> Maybe Double

-- | Create a value of <a>DoubleArrayOptions</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceFields:DoubleArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>doubleArrayOptions_sourceFields</a> - A list of source fields to
--   map to the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:facetEnabled:DoubleArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>doubleArrayOptions_facetEnabled</a> - Whether facet information can
--   be returned for the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:returnEnabled:DoubleArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>doubleArrayOptions_returnEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the
--   field can be returned in the search results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:searchEnabled:DoubleArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>doubleArrayOptions_searchEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the
--   field are searchable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultValue:DoubleArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>doubleArrayOptions_defaultValue</a> - A value to use for the field
--   if the field isn't specified for a document.
newDoubleArrayOptions :: DoubleArrayOptions

-- | A list of source fields to map to the field.
doubleArrayOptions_sourceFields :: Lens' DoubleArrayOptions (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
doubleArrayOptions_facetEnabled :: Lens' DoubleArrayOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
doubleArrayOptions_returnEnabled :: Lens' DoubleArrayOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
doubleArrayOptions_searchEnabled :: Lens' DoubleArrayOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
doubleArrayOptions_defaultValue :: Lens' DoubleArrayOptions (Maybe Double)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleArrayOptions.DoubleArrayOptions
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleArrayOptions.DoubleArrayOptions
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleArrayOptions.DoubleArrayOptions
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleArrayOptions.DoubleArrayOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleArrayOptions.DoubleArrayOptions
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleArrayOptions.DoubleArrayOptions
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleArrayOptions.DoubleArrayOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleArrayOptions.DoubleArrayOptions


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleOptions

-- | Options for a double-precision 64-bit floating point field. Present if
--   <tt>IndexFieldType</tt> specifies the field is of type
--   <tt>double</tt>. All options are enabled by default.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDoubleOptions</a> smart constructor.
data DoubleOptions
DoubleOptions' :: Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Double -> DoubleOptions

-- | Whether the field can be used to sort the search results.
[$sel:sortEnabled:DoubleOptions'] :: DoubleOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
[$sel:facetEnabled:DoubleOptions'] :: DoubleOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
[$sel:returnEnabled:DoubleOptions'] :: DoubleOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | The name of the source field to map to the field.
[$sel:sourceField:DoubleOptions'] :: DoubleOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
[$sel:searchEnabled:DoubleOptions'] :: DoubleOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document. This can be important if you are using the field in an
--   expression and that field is not present in every document.
[$sel:defaultValue:DoubleOptions'] :: DoubleOptions -> Maybe Double

-- | Create a value of <a>DoubleOptions</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sortEnabled:DoubleOptions'</a>,
--   <a>doubleOptions_sortEnabled</a> - Whether the field can be used to
--   sort the search results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:facetEnabled:DoubleOptions'</a>,
--   <a>doubleOptions_facetEnabled</a> - Whether facet information can be
--   returned for the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:returnEnabled:DoubleOptions'</a>,
--   <a>doubleOptions_returnEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the field
--   can be returned in the search results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceField:DoubleOptions'</a>,
--   <a>doubleOptions_sourceField</a> - The name of the source field to map
--   to the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:searchEnabled:DoubleOptions'</a>,
--   <a>doubleOptions_searchEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the field
--   are searchable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultValue:DoubleOptions'</a>,
--   <a>doubleOptions_defaultValue</a> - A value to use for the field if
--   the field isn't specified for a document. This can be important if you
--   are using the field in an expression and that field is not present in
--   every document.
newDoubleOptions :: DoubleOptions

-- | Whether the field can be used to sort the search results.
doubleOptions_sortEnabled :: Lens' DoubleOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
doubleOptions_facetEnabled :: Lens' DoubleOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
doubleOptions_returnEnabled :: Lens' DoubleOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | The name of the source field to map to the field.
doubleOptions_sourceField :: Lens' DoubleOptions (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
doubleOptions_searchEnabled :: Lens' DoubleOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document. This can be important if you are using the field in an
--   expression and that field is not present in every document.
doubleOptions_defaultValue :: Lens' DoubleOptions (Maybe Double)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleOptions.DoubleOptions
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleOptions.DoubleOptions
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleOptions.DoubleOptions
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleOptions.DoubleOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleOptions.DoubleOptions
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleOptions.DoubleOptions
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleOptions.DoubleOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DoubleOptions.DoubleOptions


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Expression

-- | A named expression that can be evaluated at search time. Can be used
--   to sort the search results, define other expressions, or return
--   computed information in the search results.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExpression</a> smart constructor.
data Expression
Expression' :: Text -> Text -> Expression
[$sel:expressionName:Expression'] :: Expression -> Text
[$sel:expressionValue:Expression'] :: Expression -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Expression</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:expressionName:Expression'</a>,
--   <a>expression_expressionName</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:expressionValue:Expression'</a>,
--   <a>expression_expressionValue</a> - Undocumented member.
newExpression :: Text -> Text -> Expression

-- | Undocumented member.
expression_expressionName :: Lens' Expression Text

-- | Undocumented member.
expression_expressionValue :: Lens' Expression Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Expression.Expression
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Expression.Expression
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Expression.Expression
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Expression.Expression
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Expression.Expression
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Expression.Expression
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Expression.Expression
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Expression.Expression


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType

-- | The type of field. The valid options for a field depend on the field
--   type. For more information about the supported field types, see
--   <a>Configuring Index Fields</a> in the <i>Amazon CloudSearch Developer
--   Guide</i>.
newtype IndexFieldType
IndexFieldType' :: Text -> IndexFieldType
[fromIndexFieldType] :: IndexFieldType -> Text
pattern IndexFieldType_Date :: IndexFieldType
pattern IndexFieldType_Date_array :: IndexFieldType
pattern IndexFieldType_Double :: IndexFieldType
pattern IndexFieldType_Double_array :: IndexFieldType
pattern IndexFieldType_Int :: IndexFieldType
pattern IndexFieldType_Int_array :: IndexFieldType
pattern IndexFieldType_Latlon :: IndexFieldType
pattern IndexFieldType_Literal :: IndexFieldType
pattern IndexFieldType_Literal_array :: IndexFieldType
pattern IndexFieldType_Text :: IndexFieldType
pattern IndexFieldType_Text_array :: IndexFieldType
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.ToXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSONKey Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSONKey Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Headers.ToHeader Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Log.ToLog Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance Network.AWS.Data.ByteString.ToByteString Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.ToText Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.FromText Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IndexFieldType.IndexFieldType


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntArrayOptions

-- | Options for a field that contains an array of 64-bit signed integers.
--   Present if <tt>IndexFieldType</tt> specifies the field is of type
--   <tt>int-array</tt>. All options are enabled by default.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newIntArrayOptions</a> smart constructor.
data IntArrayOptions
IntArrayOptions' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Integer -> IntArrayOptions

-- | A list of source fields to map to the field.
[$sel:sourceFields:IntArrayOptions'] :: IntArrayOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
[$sel:facetEnabled:IntArrayOptions'] :: IntArrayOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
[$sel:returnEnabled:IntArrayOptions'] :: IntArrayOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
[$sel:searchEnabled:IntArrayOptions'] :: IntArrayOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
[$sel:defaultValue:IntArrayOptions'] :: IntArrayOptions -> Maybe Integer

-- | Create a value of <a>IntArrayOptions</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceFields:IntArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>intArrayOptions_sourceFields</a> - A list of source fields to map
--   to the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:facetEnabled:IntArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>intArrayOptions_facetEnabled</a> - Whether facet information can be
--   returned for the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:returnEnabled:IntArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>intArrayOptions_returnEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the
--   field can be returned in the search results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:searchEnabled:IntArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>intArrayOptions_searchEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the
--   field are searchable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultValue:IntArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>intArrayOptions_defaultValue</a> - A value to use for the field if
--   the field isn't specified for a document.
newIntArrayOptions :: IntArrayOptions

-- | A list of source fields to map to the field.
intArrayOptions_sourceFields :: Lens' IntArrayOptions (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
intArrayOptions_facetEnabled :: Lens' IntArrayOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
intArrayOptions_returnEnabled :: Lens' IntArrayOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
intArrayOptions_searchEnabled :: Lens' IntArrayOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
intArrayOptions_defaultValue :: Lens' IntArrayOptions (Maybe Integer)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntArrayOptions.IntArrayOptions
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntArrayOptions.IntArrayOptions
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntArrayOptions.IntArrayOptions
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntArrayOptions.IntArrayOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntArrayOptions.IntArrayOptions
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntArrayOptions.IntArrayOptions
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntArrayOptions.IntArrayOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntArrayOptions.IntArrayOptions


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntOptions

-- | Options for a 64-bit signed integer field. Present if
--   <tt>IndexFieldType</tt> specifies the field is of type <tt>int</tt>.
--   All options are enabled by default.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newIntOptions</a> smart constructor.
data IntOptions
IntOptions' :: Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Integer -> IntOptions

-- | Whether the field can be used to sort the search results.
[$sel:sortEnabled:IntOptions'] :: IntOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
[$sel:facetEnabled:IntOptions'] :: IntOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
[$sel:returnEnabled:IntOptions'] :: IntOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | The name of the source field to map to the field.
[$sel:sourceField:IntOptions'] :: IntOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
[$sel:searchEnabled:IntOptions'] :: IntOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document. This can be important if you are using the field in an
--   expression and that field is not present in every document.
[$sel:defaultValue:IntOptions'] :: IntOptions -> Maybe Integer

-- | Create a value of <a>IntOptions</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sortEnabled:IntOptions'</a>, <a>intOptions_sortEnabled</a> -
--   Whether the field can be used to sort the search results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:facetEnabled:IntOptions'</a>, <a>intOptions_facetEnabled</a> -
--   Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:returnEnabled:IntOptions'</a>, <a>intOptions_returnEnabled</a>
--   - Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceField:IntOptions'</a>, <a>intOptions_sourceField</a> -
--   The name of the source field to map to the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:searchEnabled:IntOptions'</a>, <a>intOptions_searchEnabled</a>
--   - Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultValue:IntOptions'</a>, <a>intOptions_defaultValue</a> -
--   A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document. This can be important if you are using the field in an
--   expression and that field is not present in every document.
newIntOptions :: IntOptions

-- | Whether the field can be used to sort the search results.
intOptions_sortEnabled :: Lens' IntOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
intOptions_facetEnabled :: Lens' IntOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
intOptions_returnEnabled :: Lens' IntOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | The name of the source field to map to the field.
intOptions_sourceField :: Lens' IntOptions (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
intOptions_searchEnabled :: Lens' IntOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document. This can be important if you are using the field in an
--   expression and that field is not present in every document.
intOptions_defaultValue :: Lens' IntOptions (Maybe Integer)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntOptions.IntOptions
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntOptions.IntOptions
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntOptions.IntOptions
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntOptions.IntOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntOptions.IntOptions
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntOptions.IntOptions
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntOptions.IntOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.IntOptions.IntOptions


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LatLonOptions

-- | Options for a latlon field. A latlon field contains a location stored
--   as a latitude and longitude value pair. Present if
--   <tt>IndexFieldType</tt> specifies the field is of type
--   <tt>latlon</tt>. All options are enabled by default.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newLatLonOptions</a> smart constructor.
data LatLonOptions
LatLonOptions' :: Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> LatLonOptions

-- | Whether the field can be used to sort the search results.
[$sel:sortEnabled:LatLonOptions'] :: LatLonOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
[$sel:facetEnabled:LatLonOptions'] :: LatLonOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
[$sel:returnEnabled:LatLonOptions'] :: LatLonOptions -> Maybe Bool
[$sel:sourceField:LatLonOptions'] :: LatLonOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
[$sel:searchEnabled:LatLonOptions'] :: LatLonOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
[$sel:defaultValue:LatLonOptions'] :: LatLonOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>LatLonOptions</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sortEnabled:LatLonOptions'</a>,
--   <a>latLonOptions_sortEnabled</a> - Whether the field can be used to
--   sort the search results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:facetEnabled:LatLonOptions'</a>,
--   <a>latLonOptions_facetEnabled</a> - Whether facet information can be
--   returned for the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:returnEnabled:LatLonOptions'</a>,
--   <a>latLonOptions_returnEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the field
--   can be returned in the search results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceField:LatLonOptions'</a>,
--   <a>latLonOptions_sourceField</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:searchEnabled:LatLonOptions'</a>,
--   <a>latLonOptions_searchEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the field
--   are searchable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultValue:LatLonOptions'</a>,
--   <a>latLonOptions_defaultValue</a> - A value to use for the field if
--   the field isn't specified for a document.
newLatLonOptions :: LatLonOptions

-- | Whether the field can be used to sort the search results.
latLonOptions_sortEnabled :: Lens' LatLonOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
latLonOptions_facetEnabled :: Lens' LatLonOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
latLonOptions_returnEnabled :: Lens' LatLonOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Undocumented member.
latLonOptions_sourceField :: Lens' LatLonOptions (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
latLonOptions_searchEnabled :: Lens' LatLonOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
latLonOptions_defaultValue :: Lens' LatLonOptions (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LatLonOptions.LatLonOptions
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LatLonOptions.LatLonOptions
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LatLonOptions.LatLonOptions
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LatLonOptions.LatLonOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LatLonOptions.LatLonOptions
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LatLonOptions.LatLonOptions
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LatLonOptions.LatLonOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LatLonOptions.LatLonOptions


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Limits

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newLimits</a> smart constructor.
data Limits
Limits' :: Natural -> Natural -> Limits
[$sel:maximumReplicationCount:Limits'] :: Limits -> Natural
[$sel:maximumPartitionCount:Limits'] :: Limits -> Natural

-- | Create a value of <a>Limits</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:maximumReplicationCount:Limits'</a>,
--   <a>limits_maximumReplicationCount</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:maximumPartitionCount:Limits'</a>,
--   <a>limits_maximumPartitionCount</a> - Undocumented member.
newLimits :: Natural -> Natural -> Limits

-- | Undocumented member.
limits_maximumReplicationCount :: Lens' Limits Natural

-- | Undocumented member.
limits_maximumPartitionCount :: Lens' Limits Natural
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Limits.Limits
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Limits.Limits
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Limits.Limits
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Limits.Limits
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Limits.Limits
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Limits.Limits
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.Limits.Limits


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralArrayOptions

-- | Options for a field that contains an array of literal strings. Present
--   if <tt>IndexFieldType</tt> specifies the field is of type
--   <tt>literal-array</tt>. All options are enabled by default.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newLiteralArrayOptions</a> smart constructor.
data LiteralArrayOptions
LiteralArrayOptions' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> LiteralArrayOptions

-- | A list of source fields to map to the field.
[$sel:sourceFields:LiteralArrayOptions'] :: LiteralArrayOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
[$sel:facetEnabled:LiteralArrayOptions'] :: LiteralArrayOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
[$sel:returnEnabled:LiteralArrayOptions'] :: LiteralArrayOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
[$sel:searchEnabled:LiteralArrayOptions'] :: LiteralArrayOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
[$sel:defaultValue:LiteralArrayOptions'] :: LiteralArrayOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>LiteralArrayOptions</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceFields:LiteralArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>literalArrayOptions_sourceFields</a> - A list of source fields to
--   map to the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:facetEnabled:LiteralArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>literalArrayOptions_facetEnabled</a> - Whether facet information
--   can be returned for the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:returnEnabled:LiteralArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>literalArrayOptions_returnEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the
--   field can be returned in the search results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:searchEnabled:LiteralArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>literalArrayOptions_searchEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the
--   field are searchable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultValue:LiteralArrayOptions'</a>,
--   <a>literalArrayOptions_defaultValue</a> - A value to use for the field
--   if the field isn't specified for a document.
newLiteralArrayOptions :: LiteralArrayOptions

-- | A list of source fields to map to the field.
literalArrayOptions_sourceFields :: Lens' LiteralArrayOptions (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
literalArrayOptions_facetEnabled :: Lens' LiteralArrayOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
literalArrayOptions_returnEnabled :: Lens' LiteralArrayOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
literalArrayOptions_searchEnabled :: Lens' LiteralArrayOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
literalArrayOptions_defaultValue :: Lens' LiteralArrayOptions (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralArrayOptions.LiteralArrayOptions
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralArrayOptions.LiteralArrayOptions
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralArrayOptions.LiteralArrayOptions
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralArrayOptions.LiteralArrayOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralArrayOptions.LiteralArrayOptions
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralArrayOptions.LiteralArrayOptions
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralArrayOptions.LiteralArrayOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralArrayOptions.LiteralArrayOptions


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralOptions

-- | Options for literal field. Present if <tt>IndexFieldType</tt>
--   specifies the field is of type <tt>literal</tt>. All options are
--   enabled by default.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newLiteralOptions</a> smart constructor.
data LiteralOptions
LiteralOptions' :: Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> LiteralOptions

-- | Whether the field can be used to sort the search results.
[$sel:sortEnabled:LiteralOptions'] :: LiteralOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
[$sel:facetEnabled:LiteralOptions'] :: LiteralOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
[$sel:returnEnabled:LiteralOptions'] :: LiteralOptions -> Maybe Bool
[$sel:sourceField:LiteralOptions'] :: LiteralOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
[$sel:searchEnabled:LiteralOptions'] :: LiteralOptions -> Maybe Bool

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
[$sel:defaultValue:LiteralOptions'] :: LiteralOptions -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>LiteralOptions</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:sortEnabled:LiteralOptions'</a>,
--   <a>literalOptions_sortEnabled</a> - Whether the field can be used to
--   sort the search results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:facetEnabled:LiteralOptions'</a>,
--   <a>literalOptions_facetEnabled</a> - Whether facet information can be
--   returned for the field.
--   
--   <a>$sel:returnEnabled:LiteralOptions'</a>,
--   <a>literalOptions_returnEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the
--   field can be returned in the search results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:sourceField:LiteralOptions'</a>,
--   <a>literalOptions_sourceField</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:searchEnabled:LiteralOptions'</a>,
--   <a>literalOptions_searchEnabled</a> - Whether the contents of the
--   field are searchable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultValue:LiteralOptions'</a>,
--   <a>literalOptions_defaultValue</a> - A value to use for the field if
--   the field isn't specified for a document.
newLiteralOptions :: LiteralOptions

-- | Whether the field can be used to sort the search results.
literalOptions_sortEnabled :: Lens' LiteralOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether facet information can be returned for the field.
literalOptions_facetEnabled :: Lens' LiteralOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether the contents of the field can be returned in the search
--   results.
literalOptions_returnEnabled :: Lens' LiteralOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | Undocumented member.
literalOptions_sourceField :: Lens' LiteralOptions (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether the contents of the field are searchable.
literalOptions_searchEnabled :: Lens' LiteralOptions (Maybe Bool)

-- | A value to use for the field if the field isn't specified for a
--   document.
literalOptions_defaultValue :: Lens' LiteralOptions (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralOptions.LiteralOptions
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralOptions.LiteralOptions
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralOptions.LiteralOptions
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralOptions.LiteralOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralOptions.LiteralOptions
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralOptions.LiteralOptions
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralOptions.LiteralOptions
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.LiteralOptions.LiteralOptions


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState

-- | The state of processing a change to an option. One of:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>RequiresIndexDocuments: The option's latest value will not be
--   deployed until IndexDocuments has been called and indexing is
--   complete.</li>
--   <li>Processing: The option's latest value is in the process of being
--   activated.</li>
--   <li>Active: The option's latest value is fully deployed.</li>
--   <li>FailedToValidate: The option value is not compatible with the
--   domain's data and cannot be used to index the data. You must either
--   modify the option value or update or remove the incompatible
--   documents.</li>
--   </ul>
newtype OptionState
OptionState' :: Text -> OptionState
[fromOptionState] :: OptionState -> Text
pattern OptionState_Active :: OptionState
pattern OptionState_FailedToValidate :: OptionState
pattern OptionState_Processing :: OptionState
pattern OptionState_RequiresIndexDocuments :: OptionState
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.ToXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSONKey Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSONKey Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance Network.AWS.Data.Headers.ToHeader Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance Network.AWS.Data.Log.ToLog Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance Network.AWS.Data.ByteString.ToByteString Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.ToText Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.FromText Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionState.OptionState


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionStatus

-- | The status of domain configuration option.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newOptionStatus</a> smart constructor.
data OptionStatus
OptionStatus' :: Maybe Natural -> Maybe Bool -> ISO8601 -> ISO8601 -> OptionState -> OptionStatus

-- | A unique integer that indicates when this option was last updated.
[$sel:updateVersion:OptionStatus'] :: OptionStatus -> Maybe Natural

-- | Indicates that the option will be deleted once processing is complete.
[$sel:pendingDeletion:OptionStatus'] :: OptionStatus -> Maybe Bool

-- | A timestamp for when this option was created.
[$sel:creationDate:OptionStatus'] :: OptionStatus -> ISO8601

-- | A timestamp for when this option was last updated.
[$sel:updateDate:OptionStatus'] :: OptionStatus -> ISO8601

-- | The state of processing a change to an option. Possible values:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>RequiresIndexDocuments</tt>: the option's latest value will
--   not be deployed until IndexDocuments has been called and indexing is
--   complete.</li>
--   <li><tt>Processing</tt>: the option's latest value is in the process
--   of being activated.</li>
--   <li><tt>Active</tt>: the option's latest value is completely
--   deployed.</li>
--   <li><tt>FailedToValidate</tt>: the option value is not compatible with
--   the domain's data and cannot be used to index the data. You must
--   either modify the option value or update or remove the incompatible
--   documents.</li>
--   </ul>
[$sel:state:OptionStatus'] :: OptionStatus -> OptionState

-- | Create a value of <a>OptionStatus</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:updateVersion:OptionStatus'</a>,
--   <a>optionStatus_updateVersion</a> - A unique integer that indicates
--   when this option was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:pendingDeletion:OptionStatus'</a>,
--   <a>optionStatus_pendingDeletion</a> - Indicates that the option will
--   be deleted once processing is complete.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationDate:OptionStatus'</a>,
--   <a>optionStatus_creationDate</a> - A timestamp for when this option
--   was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:updateDate:OptionStatus'</a>, <a>optionStatus_updateDate</a> -
--   A timestamp for when this option was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:OptionStatus'</a>, <a>optionStatus_state</a> - The state
--   of processing a change to an option. Possible values:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>RequiresIndexDocuments</tt>: the option's latest value will
--   not be deployed until IndexDocuments has been called and indexing is
--   complete.</li>
--   <li><tt>Processing</tt>: the option's latest value is in the process
--   of being activated.</li>
--   <li><tt>Active</tt>: the option's latest value is completely
--   deployed.</li>
--   <li><tt>FailedToValidate</tt>: the option value is not compatible with
--   the domain's data and cannot be used to index the data. You must
--   either modify the option value or update or remove the incompatible
--   documents.</li>
--   </ul>
newOptionStatus :: UTCTime -> UTCTime -> OptionState -> OptionStatus

-- | A unique integer that indicates when this option was last updated.
optionStatus_updateVersion :: Lens' OptionStatus (Maybe Natural)

-- | Indicates that the option will be deleted once processing is complete.
optionStatus_pendingDeletion :: Lens' OptionStatus (Maybe Bool)

-- | A timestamp for when this option was created.
optionStatus_creationDate :: Lens' OptionStatus UTCTime

-- | A timestamp for when this option was last updated.
optionStatus_updateDate :: Lens' OptionStatus UTCTime

-- | The state of processing a change to an option. Possible values:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>RequiresIndexDocuments</tt>: the option's latest value will
--   not be deployed until IndexDocuments has been called and indexing is
--   complete.</li>
--   <li><tt>Processing</tt>: the option's latest value is in the process
--   of being activated.</li>
--   <li><tt>Active</tt>: the option's latest value is completely
--   deployed.</li>
--   <li><tt>FailedToValidate</tt>: the option value is not compatible with
--   the domain's data and cannot be used to index the data. You must
--   either modify the option value or update or remove the incompatible
--   documents.</li>
--   </ul>
optionStatus_state :: Lens' OptionStatus OptionState
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionStatus.OptionStatus
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionStatus.OptionStatus
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionStatus.OptionStatus
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionStatus.OptionStatus
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionStatus.OptionStatus
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionStatus.OptionStatus
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.OptionStatus.OptionStatus


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ExpressionStatus

-- | The value of an <tt>Expression</tt> and its current status.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExpressionStatus</a> smart constructor.
data ExpressionStatus
ExpressionStatus' :: Expression -> OptionStatus -> ExpressionStatus

-- | The expression that is evaluated for sorting while processing a search
--   request.
[$sel:options:ExpressionStatus'] :: ExpressionStatus -> Expression
[$sel:status:ExpressionStatus'] :: ExpressionStatus -> OptionStatus

-- | Create a value of <a>ExpressionStatus</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:options:ExpressionStatus'</a>, <a>expressionStatus_options</a>
--   - The expression that is evaluated for sorting while processing a
--   search request.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:ExpressionStatus'</a>, <a>expressionStatus_status</a> -
--   Undocumented member.
newExpressionStatus :: Expression -> OptionStatus -> ExpressionStatus

-- | The expression that is evaluated for sorting while processing a search
--   request.
expressionStatus_options :: Lens' ExpressionStatus Expression

-- | Undocumented member.
expressionStatus_status :: Lens' ExpressionStatus OptionStatus
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ExpressionStatus.ExpressionStatus
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ExpressionStatus.ExpressionStatus
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ExpressionStatus.ExpressionStatus
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ExpressionStatus.ExpressionStatus
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ExpressionStatus.ExpressionStatus
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ExpressionStatus.ExpressionStatus
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ExpressionStatus.ExpressionStatus

module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType

-- | The instance type (such as <tt>search.m1.small</tt>) on which an index
--   partition is hosted.
newtype PartitionInstanceType
PartitionInstanceType' :: Text -> PartitionInstanceType
[fromPartitionInstanceType] :: PartitionInstanceType -> Text
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_2xlarge :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_large :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_m1_large :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_m1_small :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_m2_2xlarge :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_m2_xlarge :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_m3_2xlarge :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_m3_large :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_m3_medium :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_m3_xlarge :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_medium :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_previousgeneration_2xlarge :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_previousgeneration_large :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_previousgeneration_small :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_previousgeneration_xlarge :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_small :: PartitionInstanceType
pattern PartitionInstanceType_Search_xlarge :: PartitionInstanceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.ToXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSONKey Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSONKey Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Headers.ToHeader Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Log.ToLog Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.ByteString.ToByteString Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.ToText Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.FromText Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.PartitionInstanceType.PartitionInstanceType


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ScalingParameters

-- | The desired instance type and desired number of replicas of each index
--   partition.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newScalingParameters</a> smart constructor.
data ScalingParameters
ScalingParameters' :: Maybe Natural -> Maybe Natural -> Maybe PartitionInstanceType -> ScalingParameters

-- | The number of replicas you want to preconfigure for each index
--   partition.
[$sel:desiredReplicationCount:ScalingParameters'] :: ScalingParameters -> Maybe Natural

-- | The number of partitions you want to preconfigure for your domain.
--   Only valid when you select <tt>m2.2xlarge</tt> as the desired instance
--   type.
[$sel:desiredPartitionCount:ScalingParameters'] :: ScalingParameters -> Maybe Natural

-- | The instance type that you want to preconfigure for your domain. For
--   example, <tt>search.m1.small</tt>.
[$sel:desiredInstanceType:ScalingParameters'] :: ScalingParameters -> Maybe PartitionInstanceType

-- | Create a value of <a>ScalingParameters</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:desiredReplicationCount:ScalingParameters'</a>,
--   <a>scalingParameters_desiredReplicationCount</a> - The number of
--   replicas you want to preconfigure for each index partition.
--   
--   <a>$sel:desiredPartitionCount:ScalingParameters'</a>,
--   <a>scalingParameters_desiredPartitionCount</a> - The number of
--   partitions you want to preconfigure for your domain. Only valid when
--   you select <tt>m2.2xlarge</tt> as the desired instance type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:desiredInstanceType:ScalingParameters'</a>,
--   <a>scalingParameters_desiredInstanceType</a> - The instance type that
--   you want to preconfigure for your domain. For example,
--   <tt>search.m1.small</tt>.
newScalingParameters :: ScalingParameters

-- | The number of replicas you want to preconfigure for each index
--   partition.
scalingParameters_desiredReplicationCount :: Lens' ScalingParameters (Maybe Natural)

-- | The number of partitions you want to preconfigure for your domain.
--   Only valid when you select <tt>m2.2xlarge</tt> as the desired instance
--   type.
scalingParameters_desiredPartitionCount :: Lens' ScalingParameters (Maybe Natural)

-- | The instance type that you want to preconfigure for your domain. For
--   example, <tt>search.m1.small</tt>.
scalingParameters_desiredInstanceType :: Lens' ScalingParameters (Maybe PartitionInstanceType)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ScalingParameters.ScalingParameters
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ScalingParameters.ScalingParameters
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ScalingParameters.ScalingParameters
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ScalingParameters.ScalingParameters
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ScalingParameters.ScalingParameters
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ScalingParameters.ScalingParameters
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ScalingParameters.ScalingParameters
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ScalingParameters.ScalingParameters


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ScalingParametersStatus

-- | The status and configuration of a search domain's scaling parameters.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newScalingParametersStatus</a> smart constructor.
data ScalingParametersStatus
ScalingParametersStatus' :: ScalingParameters -> OptionStatus -> ScalingParametersStatus
[$sel:options:ScalingParametersStatus'] :: ScalingParametersStatus -> ScalingParameters
[$sel:status:ScalingParametersStatus'] :: ScalingParametersStatus -> OptionStatus

-- | Create a value of <a>ScalingParametersStatus</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:options:ScalingParametersStatus'</a>,
--   <a>scalingParametersStatus_options</a> - Undocumented member.

--   <a>scalingParametersStatus_status</a> - Undocumented member.

instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ScalingParametersStatus.ScalingParametersStatus

module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.ServiceEndpoint

module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DomainStatus

-- | The current status of the search domain.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDomainStatus</a> smart constructor.
data DomainStatus
DomainStatus' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Natural -> Maybe Natural -> Maybe Limits -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe ServiceEndpoint -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe ServiceEndpoint -> Maybe Bool -> Text -> Text -> Bool -> DomainStatus

-- | The instance type that is being used to process search requests.
[$sel:searchInstanceType:DomainStatus'] :: DomainStatus -> Maybe Text
[$sel:arn:DomainStatus'] :: DomainStatus -> Maybe Text

-- | The number of partitions across which the search index is spread.
[$sel:searchPartitionCount:DomainStatus'] :: DomainStatus -> Maybe Natural

-- | The number of search instances that are available to process search
--   requests.
[$sel:searchInstanceCount:DomainStatus'] :: DomainStatus -> Maybe Natural
[$sel:limits:DomainStatus'] :: DomainStatus -> Maybe Limits

-- | True if processing is being done to activate the current domain
--   configuration.
[$sel:processing:DomainStatus'] :: DomainStatus -> Maybe Bool

-- | The service endpoint for requesting search results from a search
--   domain.
[$sel:searchService:DomainStatus'] :: DomainStatus -> Maybe ServiceEndpoint

-- | True if the search domain is created. It can take several minutes to
--   initialize a domain when CreateDomain is called. Newly created search
--   domains are returned from DescribeDomains with a false value for
--   Created until domain creation is complete.
[$sel:created:DomainStatus'] :: DomainStatus -> Maybe Bool

-- | The service endpoint for updating documents in a search domain.
[$sel:docService:DomainStatus'] :: DomainStatus -> Maybe ServiceEndpoint

-- | True if the search domain has been deleted. The system must clean up
--   resources dedicated to the search domain when DeleteDomain is called.
--   Newly deleted search domains are returned from DescribeDomains with a
--   true value for IsDeleted for several minutes until resource cleanup is
--   complete.
[$sel:deleted:DomainStatus'] :: DomainStatus -> Maybe Bool
[$sel:domainId:DomainStatus'] :: DomainStatus -> Text
[$sel:domainName:DomainStatus'] :: DomainStatus -> Text

-- | True if IndexDocuments needs to be called to activate the current
--   domain configuration.
[$sel:requiresIndexDocuments:DomainStatus'] :: DomainStatus -> Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>DomainStatus</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:searchInstanceType:DomainStatus'</a>,
--   <a>domainStatus_searchInstanceType</a> - The instance type that is
--   being used to process search requests.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:DomainStatus'</a>, <a>domainStatus_arn</a> - Undocumented
--   member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:searchPartitionCount:DomainStatus'</a>,
--   <a>domainStatus_searchPartitionCount</a> - The number of partitions
--   across which the search index is spread.
--   
--   <a>$sel:searchInstanceCount:DomainStatus'</a>,
--   <a>domainStatus_searchInstanceCount</a> - The number of search
--   instances that are available to process search requests.
--   
--   <a>$sel:limits:DomainStatus'</a>, <a>domainStatus_limits</a> -
--   Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:processing:DomainStatus'</a>, <a>domainStatus_processing</a> -
--   True if processing is being done to activate the current domain
--   configuration.
--   
--   <a>$sel:searchService:DomainStatus'</a>,
--   <a>domainStatus_searchService</a> - The service endpoint for
--   requesting search results from a search domain.
--   
--   <a>$sel:created:DomainStatus'</a>, <a>domainStatus_created</a> - True
--   if the search domain is created. It can take several minutes to
--   initialize a domain when CreateDomain is called. Newly created search
--   domains are returned from DescribeDomains with a false value for
--   Created until domain creation is complete.
--   
--   <a>$sel:docService:DomainStatus'</a>, <a>domainStatus_docService</a> -
--   The service endpoint for updating documents in a search domain.
--   
--   <a>$sel:deleted:DomainStatus'</a>, <a>domainStatus_deleted</a> - True
--   if the search domain has been deleted. The system must clean up
--   resources dedicated to the search domain when DeleteDomain is called.
--   Newly deleted search domains are returned from DescribeDomains with a
--   true value for IsDeleted for several minutes until resource cleanup is
--   complete.
--   
--   <a>$sel:domainId:DomainStatus'</a>, <a>domainStatus_domainId</a> -
--   Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:domainName:DomainStatus'</a>, <a>domainStatus_domainName</a> -
--   Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:requiresIndexDocuments:DomainStatus'</a>,
--   <a>domainStatus_requiresIndexDocuments</a> - True if IndexDocuments
--   needs to be called to activate the current domain configuration.
newDomainStatus :: Text -> Text -> Bool -> DomainStatus

-- | The instance type that is being used to process search requests.
domainStatus_searchInstanceType :: Lens' DomainStatus (Maybe Text)

-- | Undocumented member.
domainStatus_arn :: Lens' DomainStatus (Maybe Text)

-- | The number of partitions across which the search index is spread.
domainStatus_searchPartitionCount :: Lens' DomainStatus (Maybe Natural)

-- | The number of search instances that are available to process search
--   requests.
domainStatus_searchInstanceCount :: Lens' DomainStatus (Maybe Natural)

-- | Undocumented member.
domainStatus_limits :: Lens' DomainStatus (Maybe Limits)

-- | True if processing is being done to activate the current domain
--   configuration.
domainStatus_processing :: Lens' DomainStatus (Maybe Bool)

-- | The service endpoint for requesting search results from a search
--   domain.
domainStatus_searchService :: Lens' DomainStatus (Maybe ServiceEndpoint)

-- | True if the search domain is created. It can take several minutes to
--   initialize a domain when CreateDomain is called. Newly created search
--   domains are returned from DescribeDomains with a false value for
--   Created until domain creation is complete.
domainStatus_created :: Lens' DomainStatus (Maybe Bool)

-- | The service endpoint for updating documents in a search domain.
domainStatus_docService :: Lens' DomainStatus (Maybe ServiceEndpoint)

-- | True if the search domain has been deleted. The system must clean up
--   resources dedicated to the search domain when DeleteDomain is called.
--   Newly deleted search domains are returned from DescribeDomains with a
--   true value for IsDeleted for several minutes until resource cleanup is
--   complete.
domainStatus_deleted :: Lens' DomainStatus (Maybe Bool)

-- | Undocumented member.
domainStatus_domainId :: Lens' DomainStatus Text

-- | Undocumented member.
domainStatus_domainName :: Lens' DomainStatus Text

-- | True if IndexDocuments needs to be called to activate the current
--   domain configuration.
domainStatus_requiresIndexDocuments :: Lens' DomainStatus Bool
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DomainStatus.DomainStatus
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DomainStatus.DomainStatus
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DomainStatus.DomainStatus
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DomainStatus.DomainStatus
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DomainStatus.DomainStatus
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DomainStatus.DomainStatus
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.DomainStatus.DomainStatus


module Network.AWS.CloudSearch.Types.SuggesterFuzzyMatching

[fromSuggesterFuzzyMatching] :: SuggesterFuzzyMatching -> Text
pattern SuggesterFuzzyMatching_High :: SuggesterFuzzyMatching

pattern SuggesterFuzzyMatching_None :: SuggesterFuzzyMatching
